name: EDU Inventory Project
body:
# Higher Education Website Inventory
A list of all .edu domains and information about them.

## Files
* [edu-list.txt](https://github.com/nickdenardis/edu-inventory/blob/master/edu-list.txt) - List of all .edu domains one per line.
* [edu-info.csv](https://github.com/nickdenardis/edu-inventory/blob/master/edu-info.csv) - Information about each domain. URL, Title, Response, Size, Speed.
* [snapshots/[domain]](https://github.com/nickdenardis/edu-inventory/tree/master/snapshots) - Collection of screenshots for each valid domain. Filename is unix timestamp.

## Command Line Tools
* php update/edu-list.php - Update the list from the most recent EDUCAUSE database.
* php update/edu-info.php - Updates the csv with all meta information about each domain.
* php update/edu-snapshots.php - Takes a screenshot of each valid website from the CSV and saves it to the snapshots/[domain]/timestamp.jpg directory.
tagline: Complete list of .edu domains, meta information and screenshots.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
